ValidationRule.description: This rule prevents competitior product names from being entered into comments.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'FRAYMAN'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'FRAYMAN'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'TFG'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'TFG'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'COMPLIGUARD'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'COMPLIGUARD'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'TIMEKM'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'TIMEKM'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'TIME KM'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'TIME KM'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'TIKIT'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'TIKIT'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'LEGAL55'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'LEGAL55'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'LEGAL 55'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'LEGAL 55'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'ELEMENT55'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'ELEMENT55'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'ELEMENT 55'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'ELEMENT 55'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'CHROMETA'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'CHROMETA'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'IMPRIVATE'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'IMPRIVATE'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'DOCAUTO'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'DOCAUTO'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'SECURITYGUARD'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'SECURITYGUARD'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'WINCWALL'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'WINCWALL'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'MASTERETHICS'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'MASTERETHICS'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'WERTHEIM GLOBAL SOLUTIONS'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'WERTHEIM GLOBAL SOLUTIONS'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'RBRO SOLUTIONS'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'RBRO SOLUTIONS'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'YOUNTS CONSULTING'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'YOUNTS CONSULTING'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'ADEPTIA INTEGRATION SUITE'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'ADEPTIA INTEGRATION SUITE'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'BIZTALK'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'BIZTALK'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'JITTERBIT'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'JITTERBIT'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'ADROITLOGIC'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'ADROITLOGIC'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'APACHE CAMEL'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'APACHE CAMEL'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Title),'APACHE SYNAPSE'),CONTAINS(UPPER(Body),'APACHE SYNAPSE'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Your idea contains a word or words that is not accepted. If you think you see this message mistakenly, please, contact support@intapp.com with your comment so we can improve our filters. (1)
